ISSUE.TITLE: Unable to pick May 31 2021 in date picker
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: NocoDB used as docker : true NocoDB version : 0.11.32 Database used in NC_DB URL : pg Project was created by clicking : New Project Database on which spreadsheet is created : pg OS on which NocoDB is running : Ubuntu 20.04 Server Node.js version if running as node : Database version : Postgres 12.8 **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Create new column 2. Column Type: Date 3. Type in database: date 4. Click field to get date picker 5. Try to pick May 31 2021 - it only goes up to 29. **Expected behavior** I expect the correct number of days in the calendar month. **Screenshots** ![no-may-31](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1290732/133867692-7e3c761c-4bdf-4ab1-a7ab-6b388da916d6.png)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix(gui): show all dates in datepicker re #542 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
